## What I can set up
- Price watchlist and alerts (thresholds or daily/weekly summaries)
- News digest focused on XMR, BTC, and XLM
- Wallet and custody recommendations (privacy for XMR, multisig/custody for BTC, lightweight options for XLM)
- Portfolio tracking with DCA/reminders

## Quick questions
1. Do you want price alerts, news digests, or both?
2. Are you tracking actual holdings or just monitoring prices?
3. Any preferred exchanges, wallets, or alert channels (email, push, SMS)? [M1]
